PathfindHelpMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
PathfindHelpMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

PathfindHelpMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
PathfindHelpMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
PathfindHelpMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

PathfindHelpMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
PathfindHelpMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

PathfindHelpMod:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.NAME: Special Strike
PathfindHelpMod:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !PathfindHelpMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

PathfindHelpMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
PathfindHelpMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !PathfindHelpMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
